title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Energy cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Lighting Types.

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Lighting Type is 0.06.
The Energy cost in U.S. dollars of Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) is 453.5% larger than the minimum value at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Energy cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Lighting Types.

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Lighting Type is 0.06.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Energy cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Lighting Types.

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Lighting Type is 0.06.
The Energy cost in U.S. dollars of Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) is 453.5% larger than the minimum value at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Lighting Type, and Energy cost in U.S. dollars in each Lighting Type on the y axis.

Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) has the highest Energy cost in U.S. dollars and LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) has the lowest Energy cost in U.S. dollars.
The second highest Energy cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Lighting Type Mini-incandescent lights (300 lights 0.4 watts each).
There is a difference of 27.15 between the maximum Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and minimum Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
Considered together, the average Energy cost in U.S. dollars in all 3 Lighting Types is roughly 11.27.
Summing up the values of all Lighting Types, we get total 33.8.

data.Lighting Type: Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each)
